summary: Integration test suite that validates core vulnerability processing functions such as hierarchical path comparison, reachable CVE mapping, full CVE enrichment, package name normalization across various naming conventions, and proper handling of unsupported static analysis languages.
business_intent: Guarantee that the security scanning pipeline accurately resolves file paths, enriches CVE data, normalizes package identifiers, and gracefully reports unsupported languages, thereby delivering reliable vulnerability detection for downstream applications.
